Should you ‘forever’ mask in some settings? Here’s what UCSF’s Bob Wachter is doing

Dr. Bob Wachter recently shared on Twitter that while he’s open to taking more risks as COVID-19 cases in the Bay Area come down, he’ll almost always mask up in some situations — forever. His risk calculus is similar to many health experts in the Bay Area.

After a mass shooting, one Bay Area city got tougher on guns. Did it work?

San Jose and Gilroy know the horror that Half Moon Bay is enduring following a mass shooting that left seven people dead. But the two cities responded differently to their mass shootings: San Jose adopted specific policies; Gilroy did almost nothing.
